title: FT: T206 Sovereign 460 Hal Chase Holding Trophy SGC 60
author: Tobacco&Gum

posts.post_title: FT: T206 Sovereign 460 Hal Chase Holding Trophy SGC 60
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

Looking to trade this card. Most of my cards are poor to good, so this one sticks out like a sore thumb. :p

FWIW, it's  the highest graded by SGC, and the only one graded higher is a PSA 6. 

In return I'd be looking for Highlanders (NY AL) T206's in poor to vg condition
with Cycle 460 and above reverses.

A couple exceptions would be Keeler, or Chesbro in EPDG, or Sovereign 150/350 backs

I wouldn't be opposed to a trade/cash situation if the right card was involved, but I'm not looking to sell it outright at this time.

PM me if you think you have something that's a match. Thanks!

[URL=http://s1049.photobucket.com/user/TheBabe1918/media/IMG_0001_NEW_zps08bf7077.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s386/TheBabe1918/IMG_0001_NEW_zps08bf7077.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s1049.photobucket.com/user/TheBabe1918/media/IMG_0004_NEW_zps9a019380.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1049.photobucket.com/albums/s386/TheBabe1918/IMG_0004_NEW_zps9a019380.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
A beauty !! Gotta hit the vault and see what I have !
